com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.server

Interface CommonServer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommonServerBase, CraftBukkitServer, MCPCPlusServer, SpigotServer, SportBukkitServer, UnknownServer

    public interface CommonServer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disable(CommonPlugin plugin)
      Prepares this server for disabling of BKCommonLib
      void enable(CommonPlugin plugin)
      Prepares this server for enabling of BKCommonLIb

      Gets the real Class name for the given Path, allowing Class path translations to occur

      Obtains the Entity remove queue used for queuing removal packets for a Player

      Obtains the real field name for a given field, allowing name translations to occur

    • Method Detail

      • init

        boolean init()
        Tries to initialize the server
        Returns:
        True if initializing was successful, False if not

      • postInit

        void postInit()
        Called after the init() method successfully detected the server and initialized the server. In here processing that depends on the CommonServer instance being fully initialized can be continued.

      • enable

        void enable(CommonPlugin plugin)
        Prepares this server for enabling of BKCommonLIb
        Parameters:
        plugin - instance

      • disable

        void disable(CommonPlugin plugin)
        Prepares this server for disabling of BKCommonLib
        Parameters:
        plugin - instance

      • getServerVersion

        java.lang.String getServerVersion()
        Gets the versioning information of the server
        Returns:
        server versioning description

      • getServerName

        java.lang.String getServerName()
        Gets the full name of the server
        Returns:
        server name

      • getServerDescription

        java.lang.String getServerDescription()
        Gets a more detailed description of the server, excluding the server version
        Returns:
        server description

      • getClassName

        java.lang.String getClassName(java.lang.String path)
        Gets the real Class name for the given Path, allowing Class path translations to occur
        Parameters:
        path - to the Class to fix
        Returns:
        the real Class path

      • getMethodName

        java.lang.String getMethodName(java.lang.Class<?> type,
                             java.lang.String methodName,
                             java.lang.Class<?>... params)
        Obtains the real method name for a given method, allowing name translations to occur
        Parameters:
        type - of Class the method is in
        methodName - of the method to fix
        params - of the method
        Returns:
        the (translated) method name

      • getFieldName

        java.lang.String getFieldName(java.lang.Class<?> type,
                            java.lang.String fieldName)
        Obtains the real field name for a given field, allowing name translations to occur
        Parameters:
        type - of Class the field is in
        fieldName - of the field to fix
        Returns:
        the (translated) field name

      • isCompatible

        boolean isCompatible()
        Checks whether BKCommonLib is compatible with this server
        Returns:
        True if compatible, False if not

      • getMinecraftVersion

        java.lang.String getMinecraftVersion()
        Gets the version of Minecraft the server supports
        Returns:
        Minecraft version

      • getWorldRegionFolder

        java.io.File getWorldRegionFolder(java.lang.String worldName)
        Gets the File Location where the regions of a world are contained
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Region folder

      • getWorldFolder

        Returns:

      • getLoadableWorlds

        java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getLoadableWorlds()
        Gets a Collection of all worlds that can be loaded without creating it
        Returns:
        Loadable world names

      • isLoadableWorld

        boolean isLoadableWorld(java.lang.String worldName)
        Checks whether the World name specified contains a folder and can be loaded
        Parameters:
        worldName - to check
        Returns:
        True if the world can be loaded, False if not

      • getEntityRemoveQueue

        java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getEntityRemoveQueue(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Obtains the Entity remove queue used for queuing removal packets for a Player
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Entity remove queue
